statements: SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, total_sales FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, total_sales FROM customers WHERE total_sales > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT customer_name, last_purchase_date FROM customers ORDER BY last_purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE total_sales > 1000 ORDER BY last_purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, total_sales FROM customers WHERE last_purchase_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY total_sales ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, last_purchase_date FROM customers WHERE total_sales BETWEEN 500 AND 2000 ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT customer_name, total_sales, last_purchase_date FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY last_purchase_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE total_spent > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, name, total_spent FROM customers ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY order_total DESC;
SELECT orders.order_id, orders.order_date, customers.name FROM orders INNER JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE total_spent >= 1000 ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT name, email, total_spent FROM customers WHERE total_spent > 5000
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY order_total DESC
SELECT c.name, o.order_date, o.order_total FROM customers c INNER JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id WHERE c.total_spent > 2000 AND o.order_total < 500

SELECT c.name AS customer_name, c.email AS customer_email, sum(o.order_total) AS total_orders FROM customers c LEFT JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id GROUP BY c.name,c.email ORDER BY total_orders DESC
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, join_date FROM customers ORDER BY join_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE purchase_amount > 1000;
SELECT segment_name, segment_value FROM customer_segments ORDER BY segment_value ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE join_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY join_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_amount, purchase_date FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE purchase_amount > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT customers.customer_name, customer_segments.segment_name FROM customers JOIN customer_segments ON customers.customer_id = customer_segments.customer_id WHERE segment_value < 50;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE join_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, lifetime_value FROM customers WHERE lifetime_value > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, segment_name FROM customers JOIN customer_segments ON customers.customer_id = customer_segments.customer_id WHERE segment_name = 'VIP';
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, lifetime_value FROM customers WHERE lifetime_value > 1000 ORDER BY lifetime_value DESC;
SELECT c.customer_name, p.purchase_amount, p.purchase_date FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id WHERE p.purchase_amount > 500 ORDER BY p.purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price BETWEEN 10 AND 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT c.customer_name, s.segment_name FROM customers c JOIN customer_segments s ON c.customer_id = s.customer_id WHERE s.segment_name = 'VIP';
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price <= 100.00;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 500.00 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM orders ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount BETWEEN 100 AND 500 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT segment_name, segment_description FROM customer_segments WHERE CHAR_LENGTH(segment_description) > 50 ORDER BY segment_name ASC;
